name: Mechuiti
description: Mechuiti is a gargantuan fiend exuding chaotic energy, with a terrifying presence and covered in a caustic ichor that inflicts disease upon those who dare to harm it. Its skin glistens with dark energies, and its fiery attacks leave destruction in their wake.
memorable: Mechuiti inflicts debilitating disease through its ichor and has incredible resistance to various damage types.
goals: To dominate its environment and instill fear in all who encounter it.
relations: Often found commanding legions of lesser fiends or lurking in the depths of hellish landscapes.
environment: Usually resides in hellish realms or chaotic battlegrounds.
strengths: High damage potential, disease-inflicting abilities, and strong magical resistance.
attacks: Mechuiti's attacks include vicious bite and claw strikes that deal both piercing/slashing and devastating fire damage.
most_powerful_ability: Demon Lord’s Ichor, which infects attackers with a debilitating disease that can lead to death.
senses: Mechuiti possesses truesight extending 120 feet and a passive Perception of 22, allowing it to perceive threats effectively.
additional_information: Immunities to many damage types and conditions.
Can speak telepathically up to 300 feet.
Can cast powerful spells without needing material components.
Legendary Resistance allows it to bypass saving throw failures.
Frightful Presence that terrorizes all enemies within range.
spellcasting: Can cast spells such as Dispel Magic, Hold Monster, Wall of Fire at will and Fire Storm, Power Word Stun three times per day.
test_queries: gargantuan fiend causing disease with ichor
chaotic evil fire demon with deadly ichor
powerful monstrous fiend with spellcasting and fire attacks
high HP fiend vulnerable to cold attacks
